name: Gambit (Baxter Dulieu, Delcan, ItsFitzy, JokerMain, CB120, David Schutte)
name_original: Gambit (Baxter Dulieu, Delcan, ItsFitzy, JokerMain, CB120, David Schutte)
description:
You traverse the land of Quadradia besieging castles and taking control in order to grow your influence. You and your army use strategy to take down any resistance as you travel closer to your ultimate goal, overthrowing Quadradia's King.

Gambit is an isometric turn-based strategy game with a medieval theme. The game is Player vs. A.I., with each participant taking turns using their troops to overthrow each-other’s stronghold.
